attributes.action: Build a big barge that can catch sinking ships before they sink.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: My name is Gabrielle and I'm 6 and I watched Blue Peter and newsround about a sinking ship in Britian. I think Mr Blair should build a rescue barge for rescuing sinking ships before they sink near Britian. The ship on the news could have been stopped from sinking by floating a barge under it and this would stop all the birds dying and beaches getting dirty.
